name: EnvyPopup – All-in-One Popup Management WordPress Plugin
author: EnvyTheme

sections.description:
EnvyPopup is a WordPress popup plugin which allows you to create unlimited popup to notify your customers. This plugin has the options to add position, unlimited colors, background colors, font size, font weight, search, countdown, animation etc to make your popup more attractive & professional.

EnvyPopup Management

Target Options

* Where You Want to Show?
* Popup Show Event
* Popup Content Area
* Hide/Show on Mobile Devices
* Hide/Show on Desktop Devices
* Popup Delay Time
* Cookie System

Content Option

* Popup Background Color
* Title Font Size
* Title Font Weight
* Title Font Color
* Title Scrolling Enabled/Disabled
* Content Font Size
* Content Font Weight
* Content Font Color
* Search Option Enabled/Disabled

Animation Options

* Animation For Start Popup
* Slide  - slideUp & slideDown
* Fade  - fadeIn & fadeOut
* Animation For End Popup
* Slide  - slideUp & slideDown
* Fade  - fadeIn & fadeOut
sections.installation:
From the dashboard:

  1. Go to the WordPress Dashboard “Add New Plugin” section
  2. Search For “EnvyPopup”
  3. Install, then Activate it

From control panel:

  1. Unzip (if it is zipped) and Upload envy-popup folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
